entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the one who turned to Narcissa's sister. He is a person who can help Narcissa.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is Snape's sister and she has nowhere else to turn for help.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is Narcissa's husband who is in jail.

relationships.description: Narcissa is the wife of Lucius.
